title: Excalibur Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Licensed vegetarian cafe serving all vegan food except for use of bee products. Specializes in healthy, organic with raw food options; desserts, hot drinks, elixirs, fresh juices and alcoholic beverages. Clearly labelled vegetarian, vegan, raw, gluten-free, nut and sattvic menu.
